33 namespace reactphysics3d {
34 
35 // Structure FixedJointInfo
40 struct FixedJointInfo : public JointInfo {
41 
42  public :
43 
44  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
45 
47  bool isUsingLocalSpaceAnchors;
48 
50  Vector3 anchorPointWorldSpace;
51 
53  Vector3 anchorPointBody1LocalSpace;
54 
56  Vector3 anchorPointBody2LocalSpace;
57 
59 
65  FixedJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
66  const Vector3& initAnchorPointWorldSpace)
67  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::FIXEDJOINT),
68  isUsingLocalSpaceAnchors(false),
69  anchorPointWorldSpace(initAnchorPointWorldSpace){}
70 
72 
78  FixedJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
79  const Vector3& anchorPointBody1LocalSpace,
80  const Vector3& anchorPointBody2LocalSpace)
81  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::FIXEDJOINT),
82  isUsingLocalSpaceAnchors(true),
83  anchorPointBody1LocalSpace(anchorPointBody1LocalSpace),
84  anchorPointBody2LocalSpace(anchorPointBody2LocalSpace) {}
85 };
86 
87 // Class FixedJoint
92 class FixedJoint : public Joint {
93 
94  private :
95 
96  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
97 
99  virtual size_t getSizeInBytes() const override;
100 
101  public :
102 
103  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
104 
106  FixedJoint(Entity entity, PhysicsWorld& world, const FixedJointInfo& jointInfo);
107 
109  virtual ~FixedJoint() override = default;
110 
112  FixedJoint(const FixedJoint& constraint) = delete;
113 
115  virtual Vector3 getReactionForce(decimal timeStep) const override;
116 
118  virtual Vector3 getReactionTorque(decimal timeStep) const override;
119 
121  virtual std::string to_string() const override;
122 
124  FixedJoint& operator=(const FixedJoint& constraint) = delete;
125 };
126 
127 // Return the number of bytes used by the joint
128 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE size_t FixedJoint::getSizeInBytes() const {
129  return sizeof(FixedJoint);
130 }
131 
132 }
